title: Query inside the sort
description:
Hi All,

 I need a help in solr search. I wanted to use sorting in my application with a complex conditions.

Please see below line for sorting:

 sort=sum(geodist(geocode,42.358162,-71.054065),membership_level_no, query(if(zipcode==94123) and status ==1)1 else 0 asc

right now in sum() function first two arguments are fine I want to add a query which will work something like I wrote above.

Please anyone can give me idea to achieve this.

Thanks you,
Jitu

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise this issue on the user's list. The JIRAs are for bugs, and this doesn't appear to be a bug. See:
http://lucene.apache.org/solr/mailing_lists.html and click on the "subscribe to list" link under "Users".

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: This is a question about forming queries, not a bug. We can re-open it later if necessary.
